participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Studious and pragmatic, with a focus on career and personal goals.
participant_1.background: I need a home that is close to school and has a quiet environment so I can focus on my studies. I enjoy working with my team and getting to help people. I don't believe in love. I like to read true crime novels. I like to make fresh pies.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and social, with a passion for music and relationships.
participant_2.background: My longest relationship was four years. Music has always been my number one passion. I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates. I live with my boyfriend of 5 years. I am in good shape, and I am happy with my weight.

content.text: I really need to find a new place to live. I'm starting to hate my commute to work.
I know how you feel, I have a pretty long commute to work too.
My longest relationship was four years, how about you?
I've been with my boyfriend for five years now.
I don't believe in love, but I love my job.
Music has always been my number one passion.
I like to make fresh pies, what do you like to do in your free time?
I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates, do you do anything similar?
I'm not really interested in dating, I'm more focused on my career.
I'm in a good relationship, and I'm happy with my weight.
I need to find a place to live that's close to school and has a quiet environment so I can focus on my studies.
I know how you feel, I have a pretty long commute to work too.
I'm starting to hate my commute to work, I really need to find a new place to live.
